news.message:
Building on the great feedback we received on the IEEE VR 25 conference, we’ve just started new evaluations and techniques alongside our ongoing work on Pass-Through Embodiment (PTE), to better understand what makes it so compelling. We’re excited to continue our journey 🎉!
Be prepared 😉!

🏆 Our TVCG Journal publication on IEEE VR 25 for Investigating the Impact of Video Pass-Through Embodiment on Presence and Performance in Virtual Reality just received an Honorable Mention Award. LinkedIn Post
Attending this years 30th ACM Symposium on Virtual Reality Software and Technology (VRST) in Trier, Germany.

Keynote Speaker at Rendezvous mit der Zukunft:
Inclusion Through Innovation - Avatars as Pioneers for a Barrier-Free Society
